sentence.content: More than 100 people were feared drowned after an overcrowded ferry sank at a river junction in southern Bangladesh, police said today.

sentence.content: About 200 passengers were wounded when the pirates fired rifles and hurled homemade bombs before making off with about $83,000 in local currency, police said.
